body_html:
We do support python 3 on MacOS, but unfortunately it looks broken right now for Anaconda 3 (I should check if this happens on brew-python 3 too). I will look into it but the first I'll have time is on Tuesday unfortunately.

This does look like quite a strange problem though.

body:
We *do* support python 3 on MacOS, but unfortunately it looks broken right now for Anaconda 3 (I should check if this happens on brew-python 3 too). I will look into it but the first I'll have time is on Tuesday unfortunately.

This does look like quite a strange problem though.
